name: Medlar, Poppy Anemone, and Pear
description: Medlar, Poppy Anemone, and Pear; Joris Hoefnagel (Flemish / Hungarian, 1542 - 1600), and Georg Bocskay (Hungarian, died 1575); Vienna, Austria; 1561 - 1562; illumination added 1591 - 1596; Watercolors, gold and silver paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 16.6 x 12.4 cm (6 9/16 x 4 7/8 in.); Ms. 20, fol. 13; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Medlar, Poppy Anemone, and Pear
medium: Watercolors, gold and silver paint, and ink on parchment
